title: This New Cloud Tool Launches OpenClaw in SECONDS - No VPS Required!
description:
Tired of setting up servers, managing ports, and keeping bots online 24/7? Meet Kimi Claw — the fastest way to deploy OpenClaw to the cloud in seconds, no VPS required.

With Kimi Claw, you can spin up a production-ready OpenClaw instance instantly and keep it running with 24/7 uptime. Each deployment includes 40 GB of storage for your files, logs, and media, so you can scale your bots without juggling disk space. You also get instant access to over 5,000 skills from the ClawHub marketplace — extend your bot’s capabilities right away without writing extra code.

Why Kimi Claw?
- Launch in seconds: Skip the server setup. Kimi Claw handles provisioning and configuration automatically.
- No VPS required: Deploy to the cloud without managing a virtual private server.
- 24/7 uptime: Keep your OpenClaw instances running reliably around the clock.
- 40 GB storage: Plenty of room for your data, assets, and logs.
- 5,000+ ClawHub skills: Expand functionality with a rich marketplace of plug‑and‑play skills.
- Auto-scaling resources: No hardware limits — the service scales cloud resources as your workload grows.

Who is it for?
Developers, indie makers, and teams who want to deploy OpenClaw quickly and focus on building features instead of infrastructure. Whether you’re prototyping a new bot, running a community project, or launching a production workflow, Kimi Claw streamlines the entire process.

Get started:
- Visit kimi.com to create your free account.
- Explore Kimi Bot at kimi.com/bot and connect your workflow.
- Deploy OpenClaw via Kimi Claw and pick skills from the ClawHub marketplace.
